mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cafehi_cart (cart_code, member_code, menu_code, cart_amount, cart_writetime, cart_updatetime) VALUES (seq_cart.nextval, #{member_code}, #{menu_code}, #{cart_amount}, #{cart_writetime}, #{cart_updatetime})
mapper.select:
SELECT cart_code, p.menu_code, m.member_id, member_name, menu_name, cart_amount, menu_price, (menu_price*cart_amount) money
FROM cafehi_member m, cafehi_cart c, cafehi_menu p
WHERE m.member_code = c.member_code and c.menu_code = p.menu_code and c.member_code=#{member_code} ORDER BY cart_code
mapper.update: UPDATE cafehi_cart SET cart_amount = #{cart_amount} WHERE cart_code = #{cart_code}
